scripts.clean: rm -f build/ieq.js && rm -f build/ieq.min.js && rm -f build/temp.js && rm -rf build/build
scripts.build-debug: browserify src/ieq.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 ] ] --exclude q --exclude json-socket --exclude bluebird --im -d > build/ieq.js
scripts.build-min: browserify src/ieq.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 ] ] --exclude q --exclude json-socket --exclude bluebird --im | uglifyjs -c > build/ieq.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
